props.name: id
props.description: A unique identifier for the checkbox

props.name: name
props.description: The name attribute of the checkbox

props.name: label
props.description: The label shown above the checkbox

props.name: value
props.description: The value attribute of the checkbox

props.name: model
props.description: The model that the checkbox value syncs to

slots.name: (default)
slots.description: The default slot holds the checkbox label and can contain HTML

events.name: change
events.description: Dispatched when the checkbox is changed
